## Bio

As academic faculty, I led cancer-focused research teams in the application / development of tools for applied <span class="highlight">machine learning, causal inference, and biostatistics</span>. In the post-academic setting, I direct data science efforts in <span class="highlight">cloud-based informatics and advanced analytics</span> with a focus in oncology clinical trials.
